title: @Batchy
body:
Is your IGN : your hero batchy
cuz I saw the person ^ playing vi, and I know you love your vi and you did very well, I watched this on Mageofpie's stream :D

replies.body:
I should pay more attention to when Mage is streaming and invade myself all up into that more often.
One of the watchers really doesn't like me XD
Is that your smurf Batchy? Because you have a Platinum 2014 Badge and your hero batchy is gold 5

Possibly. Who is mageofpie?

Edit, oh he was the trist. I see.
Yeah that is him. He is pretty decent with Vi, he taught me how to play her too.
